answer_en: What hasn't your friend paid for yet?
transcription: [wɒt ˈhæznt jɔ: frend peɪd fɔ: jet?]

prompt_ru: Произошло неожиданное снижение продаж
answer_en: There was an unexpected decrease in sales
transcription: [ðeə wɒz ən ˌʌnɪksˈpektɪd ˈdi:kri:s ɪn seɪlz]
